songs.title: Sadie
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Yeah)
Shit I'm a hustler in the land of the free
Got one foot in the game the other one on the beat
Every morning I wake up to my family's needs
And they gotta eat so I gotta leave
If you don't like it then it's more for me
Ain't nobody gonna help me get these dollars but me
In the home of Mercedes, Bentley's, impalas and Prius
Ain't no room for the needy, only room for the greedy

[Chorus]
Ay you's a fool if you think someone'll do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya.)
Ay you's a fool if you think someone'll do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya.)
You's a fool if you think they'll do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya.)
Ay you's a fool if you think someone'll do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya

[Verse 2]
I know some people tell me I shouldn't smoke
Same people be mixing their Henny with Coke
Same people addicted to reality soaps
Shit, life's a joke nigga leave me alone
Say what's the difference if I'm minding my business?
Ain't nobody offending, ain't no reason for bitchin'
I've been grinding and mining with my hands in the trenches
Where was you at?

[Chorus]
Ay you's a fool if you think someone will do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya
Ay you's a fool if you think someone will do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya
You's a fool if you ain't wanna do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya
Ay you's a fool if you think someone will do it for ya
Nobody's gonna do it for ya
